metadata.title: CVE-2023-35133 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the logic used to check 0.0.0.0 against the cURL blocked hostslists resulted in an SSRF risk. This flaw affects Moodle versions 4.2, 4.1to 4.1.3, 4.0 to 4.0.8, 3.11 to 3.11.14, 3.9 to 3.9.21 and earlierunsupported versions.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
